Title: Learn from the poor and lower-middle peasants and serve them
Publisher: Renmin tiyu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: Villagers watch a young girl dancing on a narrow bench, in the absence of a balance beam as used in gymnastics. She and the other young girls in the audience are 'educated youth', sent to the countryside to learn from the peasants.
Theme: SportsUp to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
